easybuy.name: EasyBuy
easybuy.description: EasyBuy is an e-commerce platform dedicated to bringing consumers an easy, safe and enjoyable online shopping experience. With a focus on user convenience and satisfaction, EasyBuy is committed to becoming a trusted partner in fulfilling your online shopping needs.

ptaji.name: Company Profile Website PT. Aneka Jaringan Indonesia
ptaji.description: PT. Aneka Jaringan Indonesia (AJI) was founded by experienced Indonesian and Malaysian civil engineers and foundation construction practitioners, in affiliation with Aneka Jaringan Sdn Bhd, a well-known foundation constructor in Malaysian Peninsula. Officially incorporated in March 2014, AJI is a contractor specializing in deep foundation whose major expertise are in bored pile and diaphragm wall. As of today, merely after nine years since it started its operation in the early of year 2015, AJI has successfully completed more than one hundred-twenty (120) contracts of foundation construction for various building and infrastructure projects through which it has built its reputation for good workmanship, safety, quality, and timely delivery.

catatanbelanja.name: Catatan Belanja
catatanbelanja.description: This is a replica of erp that can be used in startup companies. Although it has limited features but it can be used for little teams. The main id and password is: 'bigboss' which is the admin/head account. But there are other roles such as employee, modarator, etc.

laptop.name: Laporan Terintegrasi Online Platform (LAPTOP)
laptop.description: LAPTOP is an innovative solution to make it easier to report damaged or missing facilities. We are committed to helping the campus community and institutions in maintaining and caring for public facilities.

notes.name: Notes App
notes.description: Full Stack Notes App using MERN (MongoDB, Express, React JS, Node JS). Our Notes App contains functionalities like Authentication (Login & Sign Up), Adding/Edit Notes, Pin important notes to the top, and searching through the notes.

vidtream.name: Video Streaming site
vidtream.description: This is a video streaming site built with django. You can create your account and then publish your video.

tiktaktoegame.name: Tic tac toe Game
tiktaktoegame.description: This game is developed using react.js. This is not a full stack app, so player have to play in the same device. But, it can extend to fullstack.

numbergame.name: Number Guesser Game
numbergame.description: This game is developed using vanila js. This is not a full stack app.

dicegame.name: Dice Game
dicegame.description: It is simple game to play between friends. it can be extended to a fullstack application where two friends can play this game live togather.

browserextension.name: Browser Extension For Freepik
browserextension.description: This browser extension is used by designer's who are selling their products in freepik. It is created with javascript and.

bulkwatermark.name: Bulk watermark images
bulkwatermark.description: Select the watermark/logo > chose the position > select the folder that contains the images. that's it.This app is created with python.

shopmanagement.name: Shop Management Demo
shopmanagement.description: This is a simple project build with java. It it a top level overview of a shop management system.
